title: Poster, "Be Our Guest For a Test"
inscribed: Inscribed in pink, written vertically, left: Design: Jann Church Advertising & Graphic Design, Inc., Newport Beach, CA.
description: Poster depicting, in silhouette, a row of fuchsia-colored glass containers; the last one a martini glass with a green olive and white toothpick, on cobalt blue background. Text on the right, in white: Hosts: Institute for Biological Research and Development, Inc. / Medication to be tested: Ethyl Alcohol (C2H5OH), administered orally / with your choice of several complex organic congeners. / Laboratory: Test to be administered at the foot of the waterfall, in the / Crown Center Hotel; Kansas City, Missouri. / Date: Control Group will meet on March 21, 5:30-7:00. / Submit informed consent to Nurse Gray (regrets only). 714-752-6060 / Be Our Guest For a Test Motor vehicle operation following testing is contraindicated.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Be Our Guest For a Test".
Offset lithograph. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-262.
